question: 四十
sourceMnemonic: What do you get when you have four tens? You get <vocabulary>forty</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. The only exception to this is <ja>四</ja>, which uses the kun'yomi reading, since the on'yomi reading sounds too much like the word for "death." Luckily you know these reading already, so there's nothing new to learn!
